description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fb2s0","text":"Field processing of CPT vacutainers for the Cornell Aerospace Medicine Biobank (CAMbank).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tkje","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmt7m","text":"Instructions for preserving: Plasma, PBMCs, and RBC Pellets.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: CAMbank, CPT, plasma, PBMCs, astronaut, SOMA
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"ffm6c","text":"Tube Type: BD VacutainerÂ® Mononuclear Cell Preparation Tube (CPT) (BD Biosciences: #362753)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4om3t","text":"After venipuncture, invert the tubes 8 to 10 times to fully mix in the sodium heparin anticoagulant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48p98","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkntb","text":"Store the tube upright at room temperature until centrifugation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28aoo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d98nd","text":"To ensure proper barrier formation, blood samples should be centrifuged within 2 hours of blood collection. Centrifugation more than 2 hours after specimen collection may cause incomplete barrier formation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8nv4b","text":"Note: A swing bucket centrifuge is required. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gbon","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amtvt","text":"Set centrifuge:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ff9g8","text":"acceleration: 9","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5avs7","text":"deceleration: 0","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"565ju","text":"temperature: RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20chv","text":"duration: 30 minutes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qih","text":"speed: 1800xg","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9q4e","text":"Place the CPTs in the centrifuge. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7i8fj","text":"Place a protective cover over the swing buckets in case of tube breakage. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1pk3","text":"Start the centrifuge. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77rp7","text":"Stand by the centrifuge until the centrifuge reaches max speed. Listen for signs of imbalance or compromised tube integrity. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"48q4a","text":"Carefully remove CPTs from the centrifuge and inspect for separation of red blood vs PMBCs vs plasma layers. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9etg4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bk0g","text":"Transfer CPTs to a sanitized laminar flow hood. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bng33","text":"Prepare the wash buffer (PBS + 2% FBS)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"sdt3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tahl","text":"In a 50mL conical tube, mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6r2gc","text":"24.4mL of PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4o9o9","text":"600ÂµL of FBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cc1ot","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nkcf","text":"Create more wash buffer as needed (depending on the number of tubes drawn). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"19iaq","text":"Add 5mL PBS + 2% FBS to each CPT tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8k0u8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dm0du","text":"Gently resuspend the peripheral blood mononucleocyte cells (PBMC) layer into the PBS + 2% FBS using a serological pipet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"al3cp","text":"Using a P1000, carefully aliquot plasma (yellow layer above buffy layer) into 2D barcoded tubes at 500ÂµL each. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":99,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4gr8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bsfus","text":"Do not pipet close enough to disturb the buffy coat (the cloudy PBMC cell layer).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am4nl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgnhv","text":"Return 2D tubes with plasma to the rack and place in the -80C freezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bidja","text":"One CPT tube at a time, transfer the resuspended cells into a new 15mL conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"frrqv","text":"Add fresh wash buffer to bring the conical tube volume to 15mL. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1apps","text":"Return the 15mL conical tubes to the laminar flow hood. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59lg1","text":"Gently aspirate the media away from the cell pellet. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5sikq","text":"Prepare freezing media: 10% DMSO, 90% FBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"sbh7","text":"One CPT will require 6mL of freezing media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hr2g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"60j8q","text":"Resuspend the cells of each 15mL conical tube in 6mL of freezing media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bs3jn","text":"Store the Mr. Frosty's at -80C overnight, then ship back to WCM for liquid nitrogen storage. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7uqbb","text":"Recap and freeze the CPT tubes to preserve DNA in the red blood cell pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: CAMbank: CPT Field Processing v1
